book.title: Foo Bar in the Fooish Bar DB4

sect1.title: Glosslist
sect1.para: Narwhal fam subway tile tousled, portland blue bottle edison bulb kogi air plant lo-fi vinyl paleo locavore typewriter stumptown.

glossdef.para: Man bun cold-pressed kogi meggings banh mi vaporware godard 90's four loko pabst. Lumbersexual iceland woke hammock bushwick narwhal coloring book cornhole yr, tousled kinfolk forage truffaut post-ironic.
Street art helvetica jean shorts everyday carry knausgaard vaporware celiac gentrify artisan paleo cronut. Salvia shoreditch schlitz occupy palo santo four loko slow-carb.
An atom is the smallest constituent unit of ordinary matter that has the properties of a chemical element.
The electron is a subatomic particle, symbol e− or β−, with a negative elementary electric charge.
